website_summaries.verdict: One piece is all you need for a cat costume that makes a ferocious statement.
pros: Simply designed to ensure your cat does not feel encumbered by the headpiece
Fits cats and small dogs up to 15 pounds
cons: It may not fit dogs as well as it does cats

customer_reviews.title: Adorable accessory for angry cats
customer_reviews.text: Your cat will hate it. You, however, will love it. Scout found the lion mane to be very embarrassing and made several threats on my life. She looked super cute though. The mane fits well, looks just like the pictures, and seems reasonably well made.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Great lion wig!
customer_reviews.text: Let's face it. We are all going to buy this just to laugh at how adorable our cat looks. We'll this did it. My wife and I have a brown adult tabby and a white two year old we rescued on a stormy Minnesota winter night. It turns out our white cat (Sophie) looked even better than our big brown tabby. They also love the small green feather toy that came with it. This was worth ever penny we paid and then some. And we promise not to humiliate our poor cats only once a year........or maybe a few times a year....but that's it! Maybe.
customer_reviews.author: Woodshop Man

customer_reviews.title: Pure joy
customer_reviews.text: This clearly was the best day of his life, when he received his new lion's mane. You can see the look of pure joy and satisfaction in his eyes as he plots my murder. I think he looks adorable!
customer_reviews.author: M. Ro

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and my cat actually didn't mind having it on. The photo of him wearing it got rave reviews on Facebook.
customer_reviews.author: DJF

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Blends well with my cat's orange fur! LOVE! And he loved the free catnip toy!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan M Holland

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. My wife and I can't stop laughing about how awesome it is.
customer_reviews.author: steve mills

customer_reviews.title: Deceiving
customer_reviews.text: Beware! This item says it will fit a cat up to 15 lbs. However, it won't fit my cat who weighs less than 15 lbs. The material around it isn't made of elastic so it doesn't allow it to stretch. I was going to return it but it charges you close to $6 for the return. Not even worth it.
customer_reviews.author: zarah a.

customer_reviews.title: Hahahaha so much fun for me
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for this hat for a while. It came quickly and as advertised. My cat doesn't mind it too much. He has a big head and is quite a big boy. He wears a size small or medium dog costume usually. This hat can fit a large cat it a small dog. This maybe a bit too big for a small size cat. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Delightful minutes of entertainment
customer_reviews.text: She shook it off almost immediately, but the pictures will last forever. Glorious.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Saxena

customer_reviews.title: This is the most ridiculously adorable thing I've ever found for my cat
customer_reviews.text: This is the most ridiculously adorable thing I've ever found for my cat! Yes, it took a little doing to get her into it, but after putting it on a couple of stuffed animals so she could see how it worked, she agreed to become a fierce predator! By the way, it's very sturdy and well-made, in addition to being hilarious! Thank you, Pet Krewe! Photos soon!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Aiello

customer_reviews.title: Have your own house lion!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute for cat or dog. Our elderly old cat enjoyed wearing it as a hat to keep her head warm on cold mornings, but younger cats took a while to relax so cute pictures could be made. We tried on kittens and worked well but size is exactly right for medium sized cat or dog of same size. Lots of fun for holiday greeting pictures. recommended! We photograph wild lions, leopards, jaguars, cheetahs,mountain lions , servals etc so sharing photos with friends of our new house lions was fun!
customer_reviews.author: D Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Makes for Cute Kitty Pictures
customer_reviews.text: My little kitty is cute cute cute in this lion costume. She was not pleased that I purchased it, but I did not force her to wear it for very long. Actually, about 30 seconds; she was making swipes at me with her claws out and I decided it was time to take it off. However, it was worth it. See the enclosed picture, I think you would agree with me.
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Great Way to Tame a Cat
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY!!! After weeks of getting surprise clawed in the back by this cat, I bought this as a method to get the cat back and support a good cause (double win!). The package arrived quickly and perfectly in tact. Cat LOVED the complimentary catnip toy, which kept him busy for hours. Unfortunately, he wasn't so quick to let me put on the lion mane on his head. When I finally was able to put this on his head, he quickly calmed down into a well-behaved cat that no longer surprise clawed me in the back, toes or neck. While I'm certain that the cat is plotting my murder now, it certainly helps me get a few hours of work in.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Cute in theory.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I am a person whose sanity could be easily questioned as I purchased a costume for a pet. The cat did not like my purchasing this and was frightened by it enough so that I never got it on him. There was more quality to this item than the one I purchased for my dog (Wotefusi Pet Costume Lion Mane with a dog pictured), so I will cop to having more dollars than sense in that I tried purchasing coordinated costumes for my pets.
customer_reviews.author: Matt W.

customer_reviews.title: cutie pie
customer_reviews.text: OMG my baby looks so cute with this on. Too bad it only comes in one size. My cat is only 10lbs and he has a smaller head since the SPCA neutered him at 2mo old. The ears fit pretty loose on him so he can wiggle out of it if I give him a minute. It also comes with a tiny birdy toy. It must not have too much catnip scent on it because he only played with it once. So I had to rub some of his catnip on it before he was interested again.
customer_reviews.author: bookaddict01

customer_reviews.title: it looks great and fits well
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves to attack and destroy this "wig." For the few minutes we can keep it on her head, it looks great and fits well. It casts upon her not just the looks of a lion, however, but the ferocity as well. She roars and flies around the house like a bolt of electric energy, bouncing off the walls and chairs and ceiling until she dismantles the wig. She then hefts the wig in her mouth and parades around the house with her "kill," proud of vanquishing such a formidable furry foe. Perhaps if your kitty has a calmer demeanor this lion wig may stay in place longer than it does for my little lion.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Arrives exactly as expected. My poor cat becomes immobile when wearing it though so I don't really put it on him, he tries to move backwards like he is trying to get it off of his head. It is a little comical for a bit but I remove it because he gets scared . Otherwise, highly recommend if you want a laugh. Fits most small cats.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Rogers

customer_reviews.title: It's a love hate relationship
customer_reviews.text: Sooo I wouldn't say my little lion is a big fan but I absolutely loved it!!! This is amazing and I got some adorable pictures. Calcifer is a really laid back cat so he didn't mind much but you can definitely tell he does not particularly love it. I love him and I think his coloring was perfect for this though! I love him and this will make me smile forever!
customer_reviews.author: SkylerDiGirolamo

customer_reviews.title: My cat is super adorable in this
customer_reviews.text: My cat is super adorable in this! He is an orange tabby and it looks great on him. He also doesn't mind wearing it, although his kitty brother hates it so depends on the cat. Shipped quickly and on time, great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: magenm11

customer_reviews.title: But my other loves it and prances around like he is the king of the jungle
customer_reviews.text: This is THE cutest cat costume ever. Yes, I am one of those losers who puts these things on my cats. Unlike most cat head wear (aka costumes), this one stays on, fits perfectly as it extends down the back of my cat's head so no flopping or slipping off. This is very well made. One of my cats hates it. But my other loves it and prances around like he is the king of the jungle. Very quick shipping from a great company. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: S. Summers

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the entire family
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It took our cats a few times wearing it before they stopped running backwards trying to escape, but now they tolerate it and may grow to love it if the kids keep insisting the cats need to wear it. Definitely fun, it has an adjustable velcro seam so it's easy for both the cats to escape and kids to put on the cats..
customer_reviews.author: Sakil

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Super cute inexpensive cat costume. Great quality. A lityle big but worth every penny. Easy to put on and off.
customer_reviews.author: maudie

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great entertainment
customer_reviews.text: This lions mane is a great purchase! The mane can be brushed to make the hair neatly combed or stand up like a furious lion! The inside of the mane is very soft and the ears are a cute addition. We had such a fun time dressing my two cats with the mane. Even though they seem to question why we were humiliating them, it is great entertainment. And they really enjoy the free mouse toy that came with it! I definitely reccomend this product for any cat owners that want to transform their household pets into a wild lion.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda L. Harris

customer_reviews.title: It seems like it would fit dogs much much better
customer_reviews.text: My cats must just have small heads and scrawny necks, because I don't think they will ever get big enough for this to fit. I ended up cutting slots for their ears to poke through, just behind the ears on the hood- this helped it stay on a little bit. The velcro section for the neck also needed to be taken in a lot. It seems like it would fit dogs much much better. It is definitely cute though.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L.

customer_reviews.title: Super hysterical can’t see my cats a huge fan but it’s fun to see it on her
customer_reviews.text: Super hysterical can’t see my cats a huge fan but it’s fun to see it on her
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cat likes it as much as expected
customer_reviews.text: Adorable, but my cat hates it. Am I surprised? Not at all. But it was worth it for the few minutes and the look on my husband's face when he got home and saw our black cat as a lion. She figured out how to wiggle out pretty quickly. It stayed on a little longer if it didn't cover her ears, but she's still not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: JNHMA

customer_reviews.title: Cute costume for pictures
customer_reviews.text: Great looking lion mane. My dog absolutely hates it but it was so cute to put on him for picture. The closure was a little tight--he's right at 20 lbs but I finally did get it put on right.
customer_reviews.author: DeT

customer_reviews.title: Super cute angry cat
customer_reviews.text: This costume is adorable, but look how pissed off my cat is. I could only keep her in it for just long enough to snap a couple of pics, then it had to come off before she clawed my eyes out. I think it smooshes her ears. Lol Oh well
customer_reviews.author: Jami Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Best hat ever. Angus is probably plotting my murder, but that's just another Tuesday.
customer_reviews.author: susan watson

customer_reviews.title: Son liked this, cats did not
customer_reviews.text: The cats hate this, which wasn't unexpected. I was surprised; however, at how much my son enjoyed trying to put this on the cats. That created some interesting conflicts. Otherwise, for the couple of seconds they had this one, looked hilarious.
customer_reviews.author: B. Henricks

customer_reviews.title: George treats it like a toy once he gets it off so we ...
customer_reviews.text: Literally the cutest thing ever. My cat hates it but that's what you expect when you put something on their ears. And bonus, George treats it like a toy once he gets it off so we both get enjoyment out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Carley

customer_reviews.title: My cat hates it, but I love it!
customer_reviews.text: My cat like most cats hates being dressed up. I, however, was in love with the outcome. Instead of a lazy fat kitty he is now a fierce lion who roams his territory inside. By roam I mean run away and hide. By fierce I mean he bit me, but who can blame him? He absolutely LOVES the catnip toy and the fact that shelter animals get a little love too from our purchase. One the best purchases I've made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: why not.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. Stays on well for the most part, well made, looks good. It was a little big for my cat since, with so little brain, her head is smallish. Problem was I put it on, put her on the floor and she looked at me with this "why? what did i do expression" Maybe over time she'll get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: james karl  krantz

customer_reviews.title: Cheshire Cat to Cowardly Lion
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't wait to put this on my long haired cat. Her name is Cheshire and I fancy her a greater diva version than the Cheshire Cat from Alice in Wonderland. However, to my surprise my diva with the judgmental eyes and terrifying grin did not look like the fierce lion I had anticipated... Instead she turned into the Cowardly Lion! Hahaha. Probably didn't help the puppy thought that the terrifying cat he had gotten to know for it's notorious nose bops suddenly resembled one of his chew toys... Regardless well worth it! Fantastic quality and a great cat ego deflation device ;)
customer_reviews.author: TexasNative

customer_reviews.title: Super cute on the cats
customer_reviews.text: Super cute on the cats! They hate it hahahaha. Has nothing to do with the product just like most cats they don't like something on their heads. Only thing that I don't like is that the mane sheds really easily. Otherwise - fun to have and made me laugh so hard! I had a nice surprise as the company included a free toy which I wasn't expecting. They followed up with me to make sure I liked my purchase too.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Hebert

customer_reviews.title: Improved the overall quality of my dog.
customer_reviews.text: I love this more than any reasonable person probably should. My dog would take it off if she could which makes me really glad she doesn't have thumbs. She's getting used to it though, which is good because she doesn't know it yet, but she's going to be wearing this every day now. She's a lion now and she just has to deal with that reality because she's a tiny lion-dog and I'm a person and I give her food and snuggles every day. This is really the least she can do for me.
customer_reviews.author: JJES

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is so FUN for out kittys (well really for us). At first our 2 little guys did not take too kindly to having it on their heads but after a few days of having it it their heads for a few seconds at a time, they kind of got used to it, enough for a quick picture. Fun for me to share with my family! It is very well made for the price and I would buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: justine

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: The lining of this is actually larger than the fluffy mane part and it is visible when my cat wears it. I had to put a few stitches in it to keep the lining in place.
customer_reviews.author: Kizwizzy060117

customer_reviews.title: "If I were  really a lion, I would eat you in your sleep.🦁
customer_reviews.text: We love Charlie's new Halloween costume. Charlie however....not so much🦁 Our cat wore it for 3 seconds and proceeded to take it off and start attacking it. Worth every penny! He loves the catnip toy ! Great quality and great company and service.
customer_reviews.author: Lis

customer_reviews.title: Its okay
customer_reviews.text: Cute product and quality but should have ear holes for cats. My cat didnt like his ears being covered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too cute
customer_reviews.text: My dog would not keep this on hear head, but it was soft and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Annie A

customer_reviews.title: Cat hates it - I love it
customer_reviews.text: My cat hated it so much, but I got it on him for a few pictures before I took it off. Its very nice quality. Now he sleeps on it :)
customer_reviews.author: Kallie Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Cute Costume
customer_reviews.text: This mane fits perfectly on my cat. My cat is fairly large and did not have any issues putting it on. I love that it comes with a free toy that my cat enjoys. So far, i haven't washed it since I barely received the mane so i'm not sure how it would be after washing it. Overall, it's a basically a cute costume for my cat. I do not intend to leave it on my cat for long periods of time since it's fairly hot where I currently live and it covers the whole portion of my cats head including the ears.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Petite House Lion Disapproves
customer_reviews.text: Even the cat in the ad looks annoyed, and let's face it, THIS IS WHY WE DRESS THEM UP. Our little orange dude hates us. Mission: accomplished
customer_reviews.author: Much Amaze

customer_reviews.title: Looks so cute on cats!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely hilarious! Looks so cute on my black cat, but he won't stay still long enough with it on to take photo.....Good quality item and easy to use with velcro closure. Very cute little catnip toy came with it....sadly my cat does not like catnip.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scooter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: It fits my miniature apricot poodle perfect! Not only that, he is very used to sleeping under his blanky..and was quite cozy with it on his head for over 2 hours while he helped us give out Halloween Candy. Also a great idea to keep him warm while on neighborhood walks this Fall.
customer_reviews.author: Birdy

customer_reviews.title: Pawdorable
customer_reviews.text: This is pawdorable but my cat has a very small head so I usually have to stuff the back of the hat with paper or something otherwise totally covers his eyes. However it is really cute and looks very Lionesque.
customer_reviews.author: Jellicle

customer_reviews.title: It looks super cute and perfectly matches the pictures shown
customer_reviews.text: It looks super cute and perfectly matches the pictures shown. The only problem is that our cats hate it - one just sort of freezes when we put it on him and looks like he's about to have a heart attack. The other one frantically pawed it off and tried to attack it.
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan Rachor

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but won't wear it.
customer_reviews.text: My cat won't wear it for more than 5 seconds before going crazy. I'm literally holding him down in this picture. But he's so darn cute! Very cute product though.
customer_reviews.author: Completely Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: For a full grown cat
customer_reviews.text: I loved it! It's a good quality product and it even came with a toy for my baby:) my only suggestion would be to specify that it is for a full grown cat. It fit way too big on my cat (6 weeks old) but she'll grow into it.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzyxo

customer_reviews.title: My Cat hates it, I love it though!
customer_reviews.text: This is hilarious, if you are looking for a Lion Mane for your cat, this is it! It's easy to put on and take off, just need a willing participant lol.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Etheridge

customer_reviews.title: Cute as hell.
customer_reviews.text: Cute as hell, unfortunately it came soggy af from what smelled to me like fish oil. Was a really weird, peculiar smell. Also, cats freakin hated it, for obvious reasons. Got my pictures out of it, worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Skeletonkey IFOR

customer_reviews.title: Purr-fect Little Lion
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for Halloween. All the little monsters and superheroes that came to the front door to Trick or Treat, thought our cat was so wonderful. The color matched purr-fectly with our orange Tabby. The little lion will be prancing around his domain for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: E. Kapetanakis

customer_reviews.title: the lion sleeps tonight
customer_reviews.text: When I saw the online I said I had to have it. My orange cats are cute as can be already but this would make them even more adorable. The lion mane seems well made and a mouse as a little gift. Oh you know cats well. Price is very good. Hard to get the cats to sit still but when my little lions do - everyone's heart melts - as well as some fun chuckles. The fact that some of the purchase price goes to help animals make me love this company.
customer_reviews.author: harold and oliver

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Highly recommend. Our cat loves the toy that came with it too. He looks adorable in his new lion hat. No need to search around, just order this one. It is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... buy (obviously) but the quality is high and the fun was higher
customer_reviews.text: This was a comical impulse buy (obviously) but the quality is high and the fun was higher.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Blair

customer_reviews.title: The pup looked ADORABLE in this little lion mane
customer_reviews.text: One of our pups as Simba in my daughter's play! She was Rafiki! The pup looked ADORABLE in this little lion mane!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Beckman

customer_reviews.title: I don't always leave reviews, but I do when ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't always leave reviews, but I do when it's an excuse to post a picture of my cat.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS KITTY MANE!!!!  : )
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cat mane for my grand kitty and my grand daughter has been sending me pictures of the kitty with the mane on. Hilarious!!! : )
customer_reviews.author: J. F. Ball

customer_reviews.title: Looks adorable!
customer_reviews.text: We love it because it looks incredibly cute on our cat who is similar in coloring to the product photo. Cat on the other hand doesn't love it nearly as much, but she puts up with her humans.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dewey

customer_reviews.title: Lion kitty!
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly sized for an average adult kitty head. Our cat who normally likes wearing costume stuff didn't really like this because it covers his ears. But we can get him to wear it for short periods of time
customer_reviews.author: Purplmyst

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: My little cat Lexie is tolerating the mane because i always give her treats as soon as I put it on her. Absolutely adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Corwin

customer_reviews.title: I'll wear it if you won't!
customer_reviews.text: So cute. It was for my tabby but he would not wear it. My mini Panther decided she wanted to be a lion though! Aw!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Best Amazon Impulse Buy
customer_reviews.text: Human rating: 5/5 for pure entertainment value. Cat rating: 1/5, with the single star being for the catnip toy that comes along with the lion mane. The mane fits comfortably and securely on both of our cats in spite of their grumpy protests. We love the mane, they love the catnip toy, overall well worth $15 for the endless laughs!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa S.

customer_reviews.title: Roar!
customer_reviews.text: Cute little Lion Mane. I would recommend this to all the crazy cat people out there. As expected, my babies won't wear it for long, but I sure get a kick out of seeing it on them.
customer_reviews.author: Cats4Brains

customer_reviews.title: Cute, simple and inexpensive!
customer_reviews.text: This little costume is so stupid it's​ awesome. My cat actually has grown accustomed to wearing it (so long as I give him treats throughout the process.) Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: dwayned808

customer_reviews.title: I like it but my cat hates it
customer_reviews.text: I like it but my cat hates it. It's hard to keep it on them as they shake it off quite easily. Doesnt stay on as well as the sailor costume.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny L

customer_reviews.title: I really like this lion mane
customer_reviews.text: I really like this lion mane. It fits decently well on my cat. However, the only problem I have is that the wig covers the ear. It makes it uncomfortable for the cat. This is good for only picture taking and to show off to your friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: BiologistVictor

customer_reviews.title: My cat does not like it, except to play with it
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Exactly as described by vendor. Cute as can be. My cat does not like it, except to play with it, but I love it. It's so darn cute.
customer_reviews.author: KAllen

customer_reviews.title: TOO CUTE
customer_reviews.text: I think this is hysterical, but my cats will NOT let me put it on them for a photo. Well made, very easy to attach to a willing cat.
customer_reviews.author: KL Mackay

customer_reviews.title: my cat looked exactly like the one pictured in the ad
customer_reviews.text: my cat looked exactly like the one pictured in the ad..she is an orange tabby and this mane looked adorable on her...
customer_reviews.author: katbandit

customer_reviews.title: Great product and it comes with a small little gift
customer_reviews.text: Great product and it comes with a small little gift. Which motivated me to write a review and share the good work this guys are doing!
customer_reviews.author: Javier D.

customer_reviews.title: We bought this for our Cavalier King Charles Spaniel, ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our Cavalier King Charles Spaniel, as it said it would fit small dogs. We were able to velcro it around his head, but it definitely was a little tight. He looked very cute in it though!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: It's great!
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made, should fit most cats 6 months or older. Didn't snugly fit my 3 month old kitten, but she will grow into it. The bonus catnip mouse toy is a nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: Faisal Aldaiel

customer_reviews.title: So cute.. well made.
customer_reviews.text: So cute..well made. Does slide a little and wish mane was a little bigger but overall well made
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Just adorable..
customer_reviews.text: Just adorable...so much fun..well made and arrived promptly..couldn't be more pleased..Looks cuter on a cat..but cute on small dogs too.
customer_reviews.author: J.A.

customer_reviews.title: Wish my cats liked this as much as I do
customer_reviews.text: Cute idea. Wish my cats liked this as much as I do. They won't stand for it...and I don't blame them.
customer_reviews.author: MEPchll

customer_reviews.title: Adorable & Worth the Purchase!!  (potentially a bit large for smaller cats though)
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the little lion mane for my kitty! As far as quality goes, it is very well made with quality material and feels very soft. The one comment I'd have is that even the smallest size is too large for my small-than-most four-year-old cat... That being said, I still put it on her because she looks just way too cute! Probably one of my best drunken Amazon purchases I've ever made!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Hysterical
customer_reviews.text: I love the mane, my cats on the other hand not so much. Hehe. 😂
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute Pug!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Pug and you know how perfect they are to dress up. She looks just adorable in this little mane. I did have to extend the hook-and-loop under her chin and it's so darn cute!
customer_reviews.author: puggymommy

customer_reviews.title: Cute, good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy for a dog, my dog only weights 25 lbs and it didn't fit - however great product and customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Dude!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! My cats aren't big fans of it and I'm sure they're cursing me but it damn hilarious. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Min Pin

customer_reviews.title: Harry loves it!
customer_reviews.text: So cute. I have an old sphinx-mix. His underside is bald and he's always cold. So I figured to mix it up from the usual sweaters.
customer_reviews.author: NW SS Native

customer_reviews.title: Okay - a bit misshapen in the head - there's ...
customer_reviews.text: Okay - a bit misshapen in the head - there's not really a curve there, if you know what I mean.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona Kelley

customer_reviews.title: So cute and funny!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Came quickly and fits all 4 of my cats although they're not big fans of it. They all tried to get it off as soon as possible but that's ok, i'll try it again and see if I can get them to hold still long enough to get a picture.

customer_reviews.text: The "fur" came a bit flat but after some fluffing it was good to go. This lion mane is so cute! It's the perfect size for my chihuahua mix and it's soft too. Although my dog doesn't seem to enjoy it.

customer_reviews.title: meow to MEOW
customer_reviews.text: This hat is adorable and very funny. It wasn't cumbersome for my adult cat. She looked so pleased with herself. It's very lightweight and makes an adorable house cat ferocious.

product_meta.title: Pet Krewe Lion Mane Costume | Lion Costume for Small Cats Up To 15lbs
feature_bullets: Your pet will be the king of the jungle with this cat lion mane that is finely crafted to be the most realistic looking cat mane available! It’s purrfect for parties, holidays & pet photoshoots!

The lion wig for cats has a sure-grip highly adjustable hook & loop strap to ensure no slipping so you can enjoy your little lion king without having to constantly adjust it! It’s so versatile, it can fit most animals up to 15 lbs!
This lion mane costume for cats from Pet Krewe is the perfect gift for cat lovers!

This baby lion costume will turn your kitten into a frisky & playful beast! Easy care, simply hand wash with warm water & mild soap then air dry.This baby lion costume will turn your kitten into a frisky & playful beast! Easy care, simply hand wash with warm water & mild soap then air dry.
We stand behind the quality of all of our cat costumes and dog costumes & know you will be happy with this lion mane. Our lion costume is bound to make everyone smile & laugh from cuteness overload!
